basics.summary: Backend-focused Full Stack developer building reliable, scalable systems with a strong foundation in architecture and system design.

highlights: Built a high-concurrency appointment dispatch system for VUC using Redis atomic locks and optimized SQL transactions, achieving sub-50ms latency and eliminating race conditions under load.
Designed a scalable data ingestion architecture (500GB+ healthcare datasets) using Airflow, Iceberg, and Trino for optimized OLAP querying over compressed parquet files.

Delivered a production-ready content management platform end-to-end under tight timelines, architecting a secure Admin Dashboard that streamlined the publishing workflow and enabled management of 10,000+ content pieces at launch.

Built an automated GenAI pipeline for real-time vernacular translation and structured metadata extraction, reducing manual editorial effort by ~90% and significantly accelerating global content rollout.
Built a scalable, multi-tenant ticketing system with RBAC and automated assignment using Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Redis, BullMQ, serving 200â€“250 users across 5+ teams.
Engineered a real-time notification and messaging pipeline using Redis Pub/Sub, Socket.io, PostgreSQL, handling 10k+ concurrent requests/min with horizontal scalability.

projects.name: System Design Articles
projects.description: Articles talking about system design of real-time video conferencing apps like Zoom, rate limiters, and design patterns like the transaction outbox pattern.

projects.name: Database Deep Dive Series
projects.description: Wrote articles talking about database discussions like OLTP vs OLAP, B Trees vs LSM trees, cockroachDB, TarantoolDB, MVCC, and much more.

projects.name: Finetuning Llama
projects.description: Fine-tuned the LLaMA 2 7B pretrained model using parameter-efficient techniques such as LoRA and QLoRA on an SQL dataset, following meticulous preprocessing to align the data with LLaMA's input requirements.
